decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1700, 1701, 1702, 1703, 1704, Location Plan, received 20/10/2017, 1711, 1712, 1713, 1714 received 20/10/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The works shall not commence until a Noise Assessment that demonstrates that the noise from the proposed air conditioning units shall be at least 10dB below the background noise measure at the site and shows that the noise levels within the closest residences do not exceed those specified in Table 4 of BS8233 (2014), has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing.
description: Installation of eight external air conditioning condensers on the rear elevation of the building.
